name: df-bj-proj
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(bj-cproj(c0, c1), cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c1, csn(c0)))))
comment: Definition of the class projection corresponding to tagged tuples. The expression ` ( A Proj B ) ` denotes the projection on the A^th component. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Apr-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)
